Major_Arcs.title: King Guz and Alley Oop's Debt Dispute
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around the conflict between Alley Oop and King Guz regarding an unpaid debt, culminating in a humorous resolution in the water.

sub_scenes.title: The Drowning Ruse
sub_scenes.description: King Guz feigns drowning to avoid Alley Oop and his debt, leading to a confrontation and reversal of fortune.
sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene focuses on the initial interaction between King Guz and Alley Oop regarding the debt, starting with the apparent drowning and ending with King Guz back in the water.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Dinosaur Trade and Test Drive Mishaps
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Alley Oop's journey to consider trading Dinny for a newer dinosaur, leading to a test drive with unexpected and humorous consequences.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Bronto Soreness and Trade Consideration
sub_scenes.description: Dinny's clumsiness prompts Alley Oop and another caveman to consider trading him in for a newer dinosaur model.
sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene groups the arcs where Dinny's condition is established as a problem and the initial idea of trading him is conceived.

sub_scenes.title: Honest Zog's Dealership and Test Drive
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop visits Honest Zog's dinosaur dealership, test drives a smaller model, and experiences its unexpected bucking behavior.

narrative_arcs.title: Compact Dino Test Drive and Initial Impression
Zog's Sales Pitch Confirmation and Ominous Dino

sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene encompasses the entire sequence at Honest Zog's, from arriving at the dealership to the test drive and its surprising conclusion.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Discount and Potential New Owner
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is placed on sale at a discounted price at Zog's dealership, and another caveman considers purchasing him.
sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene focuses on Dinny's fate after being traded in, showing his reduced value and the possibility of being sold to someone else.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Sales and Clumsy Dinosaurs at the Dealership
sub_scenes.description: Various dinosaur sales pitches and accidents occur at the dealership, culminating in a caveman recognizing his old dinosaur Dinny among the clumsy ones.
sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene groups together various short scenarios at the dinosaur dealership, linked by the theme of dinosaur sales and accidents, ending with Dinny's rediscovery.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Mistreatment and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is mistreated, defended by other cavemen, and reassured of a reunion with his owner, Zog.

narrative_arcs.title: Reassurance and Promise of Reunion with Zog

sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene focuses on Dinny's unfortunate situation after being traded, his mistreatment, and the promise of returning to Zog.

Major_Arcs.title: Alley Oop's Romantic Mishaps and Male Bonding
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores Alley Oop's failed romantic invitation to Coola, followed by male camaraderie and humorous fishing trip annoyances.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation and Argument with Coola
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop invites Coola fishing, leading to rejection, argument, and an abrupt, comical end with a rock.
sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene encompasses the interaction between Alley Oop and Coola, from the initial invitation to the argument and its sudden conclusion.

sub_scenes.title: Male Frustrations and Fishing Trip Annoyances
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen discuss frustrations with women and then shift to fishing trip annoyances, ending with a humorous apology.
sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene groups the arcs where male cavemen discuss general frustrations and then transition to specific fishing-related annoyances and resolutions.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Rivalry and Accusations
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen discuss romantic rivalry for Oola, leading to accusations and denial, and then a separate scene of flirtation and compliments.
sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene captures the various interactions and conversations around romantic competition and flirtation among cavemen and cavewomen.

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Violence and Romantic Clarification
sub_scenes.description: Jealousy leads to violence, followed by clarification of romantic intentions and a concluding lesson on 'the feminine heart'.
sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene depicts the escalation of romantic jealousy into physical violence and the subsequent emotional resolution and clarification of feelings.

sub_scenes.title: Learning Romance: Strategy and Misinterpretation
sub_scenes.description: An angry caveman tries to learn romance, misinterpreting gestures and resorting to misguided and violent attempts to impress Oola.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Romance as a Strategy
Plan to Learn and Apply Romance Techniques

sub_scenes.justification: This extensive sub-scene details the entire process of the angry caveman attempting to understand and apply romance, consistently failing and resorting to violence due to misinterpretations.

sub_scenes.title: More Romantic Mishaps and Cynical Observations
sub_scenes.description: Further humorous romantic mishaps are depicted, including infidelity accusations, domestic discipline, and a caveman's overly formal romantic attempt observed cynically by others.

narrative_arcs.title: Infidelity Accusation and Plea for Forgiveness

sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene groups together various shorter comedic scenarios related to romantic relationships and social observations about them.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twist Dance Fad and its Perils
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc satirizes a dance craze, 'The Twist', and its unexpected and humorous negative consequences, from injuries to social pressure.

sub_scenes.title: The Perils of 'The Twist' and Social Pressure to Dance
sub_scenes.description: The introduction of 'The Twist' leads to injuries, social pressure to participate, and eventual forced participation.

narrative_arcs.title: The Perils of the New Twist Dance
Social Pressure and Reluctance to Dance
Forced Participation and Impending Dance Party

sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene encompasses the introduction of 'The Twist', its negative effects, and the social dynamics surrounding participation in the dance.

sub_scenes.title: Learning 'The Twitch' and its Unexpected Outcomes
sub_scenes.description: A caveman seeks dance lessons for 'The Twitch', endures a painful lesson, and the true identity of the dance instructor is revealed, culminating in a disastrous 'Twitch' performance and hospitalizations.

narrative_arcs.title: Desire to Learn Dance for Ooola

sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene details the entire cycle of learning and performing 'The Twitch', from the initial desire to learn to the widespread negative health consequences and social fallout.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel Mishaps and Research in Ancient Spain
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows a time travel research mission to ancient Spain, resulting in humorous misunderstandings and Oop's unexpected intervention in a serenade.

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel Plan and Preparation
sub_scenes.description: Modern men plan to use a time machine to gather firsthand information about 16th century Spain, preparing the machine for 'Oop' to travel.

narrative_arcs.title: The Treatise on Spain and Time Travel Idea
Romantic Encounter with Oop in the Past

sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene groups the arcs related to the initial planning and preparation for the time travel mission to ancient Spain.

sub_scenes.title: The Interrupted Kiss and Time Travel to the Future
sub_scenes.description: Oop and Oola's long-awaited kiss is interrupted by time travel to the 20th century due to a malfunctioning time machine.

narrative_arcs.title: Time Machine Tuning and Imminent Kiss

sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene covers the romantic setup for the kiss and its abrupt interruption by the unexpected time travel event.

sub_scenes.title: Brief Visit to the 20th Century and Return to Spain
sub_scenes.description: Oop and Oola briefly visit the 20th century, are informed of their mission, and are immediately sent back to ancient Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Welcome to the 20th Century and the Spanish Assignment
Interrupted Kiss and Justification for Time Travel

sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene depicts the short interlude in the 20th century, the explanation of the mission, and the quick return to the past.

sub_scenes.title: Oop in Ancient Spain: Serenade Intervention and Matador Attack
sub_scenes.description: Oop arrives in ancient Spain and, misunderstanding a serenade as a 'racket', attacks the serenader, who turns out to be a famous matador.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in Spain and Initial Bewilderment

sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene follows Oop's arrival in Spain and his escalating involvement in the serenade situation, culminating in the attack on the matador and the promise of further trouble.

sub_scenes.title: Bullfight Substitution and Unlikely Victory
sub_scenes.description: Due to the injured matador, a naive man is chosen as a novelty replacement and surprisingly wins the bullfight using unorthodox methods.

narrative_arcs.title: The Injured Matador and a Novelty Replacement
The Unlikely Bullfighter Enters the Arena

sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene details the events surrounding the bullfight, from the injury of the matador to the unexpected victory of his replacement.

sub_scenes.title: Oop's Return and Jealousy
sub_scenes.description: Oop returns from his mission to the 20th century, anticipating a reward, but is met with jealousy and questioning instead of a kiss.

narrative_arcs.title: Promise of a Kiss and Rescue

sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene depicts the events surrounding Oop's return from the time travel mission, from anticipation to disappointment due to jealousy.

Major_Arcs.title: The King for a Day and the Burdens of Kingship
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the humorous realities of being 'King for a Day', contrasting leisurely expectations with the actual chaotic and demanding nature of the role.

sub_scenes.title: King for a Day Challenge and Revolt
sub_scenes.description: A 'King for a Day' challenges a skeptic to take his place temporarily, leading to an immediate revolt by the people.

narrative_arcs.title: King for a Day and a Challenge

sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene focuses on the initial setup of the 'King for a Day' scenario and the immediate, humorous revolt against the king.

sub_scenes.title: King's Leisure, Ulcer Pills, and Domestic Dispute
sub_scenes.description: The king's attempt at leisure is interrupted by the revelation of 'bon-bons' being ulcer pills and a domestic dispute over dirty feet.

narrative_arcs.title: The Chase and Foot Washing Order

sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene depicts the various humorous inconveniences and domestic troubles that undermine the king's supposed leisure and highlight the burdens of his role.

Major_Arcs.title: Clam Dispute, Attack, and King's Mealtime Chaos
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on a clam dispute, an attack on the King, and the chaotic events during the King's meal, highlighting the ongoing disturbances and conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: The Clam Dispute and Unexpected Resolution
sub_scenes.description: A dispute over found clams escalates, but is resolved unexpectedly when it's revealed the clams are stolen.
sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene focuses on the clam dispute from its inception to its unexpected and anticlimactic resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Attack on the King and Mealtime Disruptions
sub_scenes.description: The King's meal is repeatedly disrupted by an attack, accusations of greed, and a playful prank that turns violent, highlighting the constant chaos in his life.

narrative_arcs.title: Demanding Royal Treatment and Specific Food
Appetizer Satisfaction and Anticipation for Main Course
Apology and Job Offer After Violence

sub_scenes.justification: This extended sub-scene groups together all the chaotic events that disrupt the King's meal, from external attacks and internal accusations to playful pranks escalating into violence.

Major_Arcs.title: King's Resignation, Leadership Vacuum, and Strange Duck Observation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the King's resignation from his role, the ensuing discussion about leadership, and a completely separate, humorous scene observing a 'Strange Duck' character.

sub_scenes.title: King's Resignation and Leadership Question
sub_scenes.description: The King resigns from his position, leading to a discussion about who will become the new ruler.

narrative_arcs.title: King's Relief at Being Ordinary Again

sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene focuses on the King's decision to leave his role and the immediate aftermath, raising the question of succession.

sub_scenes.title: Observing 'Strange Duck'
sub_scenes.description: A separate, comedic scene where cavemen observe and attempt to measure a peculiar character labeled 'Strange Duck'.
sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene is a standalone humorous interlude focused on the observation of the 'Strange Duck' character.

Major_Arcs.title: Barberous Acts and Time Machine Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a 'Barberous Act' of forced shaving and then transitions to a separate storyline about a malfunctioning time machine and its unexpected consequences.

sub_scenes.title: 'Barberous Act' in 'Romantic Alley'
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to 'A BARBEROUS ACT' in 'ROMANTIC ALLEY', setting up a scene with a prophecy and then depicting forced shaving in a 'TONSORIAL PARLOR'.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to 'Barberous Act' and Romantic Alley
Ooola's Sudden Departure and Justified Violence

sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene groups the arcs that introduce and explain the 'Barberous Act' of forced shaving, setting it in 'Romantic Alley'.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Malfunction and Roman Soldier
sub_scenes.description: A man attempts to use a time machine, but it malfunctions and brings back a Roman soldier instead of the intended visitor.
sub_scenes.justification: This sub-scene details the time machine experiment, its unexpected outcome with the Roman soldier, and the realization of the machine's malfunction.
